Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[ExtraAssetsIm: Enable this to use the new importers.

This setting have for goal to try to fix missing prefabs caused by an EAI update. To use it, enable the setting corresponding to the version of the mod you have used in your save, restart the game, load your save and check if the missing prefabs are back and if nothing is wrong. If nothing is wrong save your save and restart the game, if there is wrong stuff quit the game without saving. This setting automatically disable itself after the restart to avoid future conflict and issue.
Create default JSON files for every new importer. You can find the created JSON in ModsData/ExtraAssetsImporter/_DefaultJson.
Enable this to use the old importers.
Load the custom surfaces, take effect after restarting the game.
Load the custom decals, take effect after restarting the game.
Load the custom net lanes, take effect after restarting the game.

This setting have for goal to try to fix missing prefabs caused by an EAI update. To use it, enable the setting corresponding to the version of the mod you have used in your save, restart the game, load your save and check if the missing prefabs are back and if nothing is wrong. If nothing is wrong save your save and restart the game, if there is wrong stuff quit the game without saving. This setting automatically disable itself after the restart to avoid future conflict and issue.
Delete the asset files from the disk if they haven't been loaded (for example, disabled mod).
Delete the database when you close the game, useful when uninstalling the mod.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[Roadway NetLanes]: This category contains all the Roadway NetLanes.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[Beach NetLanes]: This category contains all the Beach NetLanes.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[Water NetLanes]: This category contains all the Water NetLanes.
